name: blocks-shared
description: Shared components and utilities for PayloadCMS blocks with shadcn/ui integration
author: PayloadKit
features: BlockBackground - Flexible background management (color, gradient, image, overlay)
BlockSection - Responsive section wrapper with spacing controls
BlockLayout - Grid system with multiple layout options
BlockHeading - Typography component for headings with theme integration
BlockText - Rich text and plain text rendering with prose support
useThemeColor - Hook for theme-aware color management
Comprehensive TypeScript types for all components
usage: Import shared components to build consistent block layouts across your PayloadCMS application.
examples:
// Basic usage
import { BlockBackground, BlockSection, BlockHeading } from 'registry/components/blocks-shared'

// Layout example
<BlockBackground background={{ type: 'color', color: '#f1f5f9' }}>
  <BlockSection paddingTop="xl" paddingBottom="xl">
    <BlockHeading text="My Heading" level="h2" align="center" />
  </BlockSection>
</BlockBackground>

installation: Ensure Tailwind CSS is configured in your project
Import components as needed in your block implementations
setup.tailwindConfig: This component system uses standard Tailwind classes and is compatible with shadcn/ui color variables.
